	We are looking for a talented and smart Java Script Developer.

	Engaging in Agile practices, including planning, daily check-ins and reviews.
	Creating and implementing new features and functionalities.

	Knowledge of other programming languages like; HTML, CSS Java Script, and so on.

	Ability to write unit and integration tests using testing libraries.
	Good problem-solving and debugging skills.
	Strong communication skills and the ability to work collaboratively in a team.


Salary
N400,000 monthly (non-negotiable).

Method of Application

JavaScript Developer Job at Odixcity Consulting




        
    

        
        Odixcity Consulting is an International Hr consulting and procurement firm. With expertise in Recruitment & Selection, Performance management, Training & Development, Compensation and benefits as well as Outsourcing of goods and services for organizations.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: JavaScript Developer

Job Location: Remote

Job Summary


	We are looking for a talented and smart Java Script Developer.
	You will be responsible for developing and managing top-tier web applications.


Responsibilities
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	Produce well-organized, efficient, and flexible JavaScript code.
	Create new, user-centered using modern JavaScript frameworks.
	Troubleshooting and debugging technical issues.
	Engaging in code reviews and contribute ideas to optimize the codebase.
	Partner with design, back-end, and product teams to execute solutions.
	Address performance roadblock and other challenges, enhancing applications for speed and flexibility.
	Creating and running automated tests to ensure code quality and functionality.
	Ensuring seamless connecting of front-end elements with back-end services and APIs.
	Engaging in Agile practices, including planning, daily check-ins and reviews.
	Creating and implementing new features and functionalities.


Requirements


	Bachelor’s Degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering or a related field.
	A strong understanding of programming concepts, algorithms, and data structures.
	Knowledge of other programming languages like; HTML, CSS Java Script, and so on.
	Understanding basic JavaScript fundamental, and web performance optimization techniques.
	Ability to write unit and integration tests using testing libraries.
	Good problem-solving and debugging skills.
	Strong communication skills and the ability to work collaboratively in a team.


Salary
N400,000 monthly (non-negotiable).

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CVs and link to their portfolio to: jobscandidate8@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

	We are seeking an&nbsp;Accounts / Admin Officer&nbsp;to support the smooth operation of our Facility.

	Manage asset tagging, tracking, and periodic stock audits
	Oversee fleet management including vehicle documentation and maintenance
	Ensure cleanliness and ambience of the rooms in coordination with the cleaners
	Monitor lighting systems, sewage, and generator servicing

	Manage relationships with clients, suppliers, vendors, and staff for asset-related needs
	Maintain accurate logs of repairs and servicing for all equipment (generators, inverters, ACs, etc.)

	Conduct vendor research and comparison to ensure cost-effective procurement

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Accounts / Admin Officer
Job Location: Ogba-Ojodu, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Overview of the Role
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	We are seeking an Accounts / Admin Officer to support the smooth operation of our Facility.
	This role is ideal for a detail-oriented and proactive individual with a strong background in finance and administration who is passionate about making a difference in a hotel/hospital industry.


Key Responsibilities
Day-to-Day Office Operations:


	Oversee general office management and administrative duties
	Handle filing, and documentation tasks
	Ensure replenishment and inventory control of all consumables
	Provide general administrative support to the team as required


Facility and Asset Management:


	Coordinate maintenance of the facility
	Schedule and supervise repairs and servicing of equipment and fixtures
	Manage asset tagging, tracking, and periodic stock audits
	Oversee fleet management including vehicle documentation and maintenance
	Ensure cleanliness and ambience of the rooms in coordination with the cleaners
	Monitor lighting systems, sewage, and generator servicing


Relationship Management and Logistics:


	Manage relationships with clients, suppliers, vendors, and staff for asset-related needs
	Maintain accurate logs of repairs and servicing for all equipment (generators, inverters, ACs, etc.)
	Handle processing and payment of utilities (PHCN, Diesel, waste management, etc.)
	Conduct vendor research and comparison to ensure cost-effective procurement
	Coordinate logistics for client’s pick up and drop offs


Qualifications & Experience


	Bachelor’s Degree or HND in Accounting, Business Administration, or a related field.
	Minimum of 1 - 2 years of relevant work experience as an administrative or finance officer.
	Familiarity with office systems and basic finance operations.
	Must live in Lagos (Ogba, Ikeja, Ojota, Fagba, Agege, Ojodu Berger as the company is situated in Ojodu Berger).


Skills & Competencies Required:


	Basic finance and accounting knowledge.
	Proficiency in Microsoft Office, Google Suite, and basic accounting software.
	Strong organizational and time management skills.
	Excellent verbal and written communication skills.
	Proactive, self-motivated, and detail-oriented.
	Ability to work independently and prioritize tasks.
	Strong interpersonal and team collaboration skills.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: jobs@dmholdingslimited.com using "Accounts / Admin" as the subject of the email.

  "description": "FoliXx Hospitality is&nbsp;a company incorporated under the laws of the Federal Republic of Nigeria with RC Number, RC1518225 and its registered address at 142, Lekki Epe Expressway Elegushi, Ikate Lekki, Lagos State.

Established in 2018, FoLiXx Hospitality provides a sophisticated and contemporary entertainment experience. From renowned themed nightlife events and live performances to exceptional restaurants and special occasions.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: General Operations Supervisor

Job Location:&nbsp;Ikate, Lekki - Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

About the Role


	We are seeking a highly proactive, energetic, and sales-driven General Operations Supervisor / Utility Coordinator to oversee the smooth day-to-day running of our facility.
	This role is central to ensuring all utility and ambience equipment are functional, well-maintained, and optimized to create an exceptional guest experience.
	The ideal candidate is hands-on, results-oriented, observant, and passionate about hospitality, maintenance, and sales support. You&rsquo;ll be responsible for monitoring facility utilities, escalating technical or service issues promptly, promoting facility features (like our entertainment and sports equipment), and ensuring the environment is always guest-ready.


Key Responsibilities
Facility &amp; Utility Management:


	Conduct daily checks to ensure all equipment (ACs, speakers, TVs, kitchen tools, etc.) are functioning optimally.
	Coordinate and supervise all routine maintenance activities and emergency repairs.
	Work closely with vendors, electricians, and technicians to guarantee quick turnaround on utility issues.
	Keep accurate logs of equipment usage, repairs, and maintenance schedules.


Ambience &amp; Environment Oversight:


	Ensure lighting, music, d&eacute;cor, signage, and general ambience align with brand standards.
	Raise immediate flags if anything compromises customer experience, cleanliness, or functionality.
	Maintain aesthetic appeal and atmosphere of all service areas (restaurant, lounge, sports zones, etc.).


Sales Activation &amp; Guest Engagement:


	Drive guest engagement by promoting the use of entertainment features, game/sports equipment, and other experiential tools.
	Collaborate with the customer service and marketing teams to introduce small events, games, or &ldquo;fun moments&rdquo; to drive foot traffic and sales.
	Think creatively about how to maximize guest satisfaction and facility utilization.


Operations &amp; Standardization:


	Supervise general operations and coordinate with various departments (Kitchen, Lounge, Clubhouse, Maintenance, Security, etc.) to ensure smooth service flow.
	Help enforce SOPs across departments and suggest operational improvements.
	Provide regular feedback to management on potential gaps or improvements in service delivery.


Proactivity &amp; Escalation:


	Be the first to notice when things are out of place &mdash; equipment, cleanliness, service lags, etc.
	Escalate potential risks, hazards, or customer complaints promptly and appropriately.
	Step in to assist departments in high-volume moments or emergencies.


What We&rsquo;re Looking For


	2&ndash;3 years of relevant experience in hospitality, operations, or facility management
	Tech-savvy and familiar with use and maintenance of general hospitality equipment
	Strong sense of urgency and attention to detail
	Passionate about providing top-tier customer experience
	Confident, assertive communicator who knows how to escalate smartly
	Sales-oriented mindset with ability to inspire team collaboration
	Physically agile and able to work in a dynamic, fast-paced environment
	Willing to work night shifts, weekends, and public holidays when needed.


Salary
N200,000 - N300,000 per month.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV and a brief note telling us why they&rsquo;re the best fit for this role to:&nbsp;hr@folixxhospitality.com&nbsp;using the Job Position as the subject of the email.",
